Doral.South Florida Reception Center:
The South Florida Reception Center (SFRC) is a state prison for men located in Doral, Miami-Dade County, Florida, owned and operated by the Florida Department of Corrections.
This facility has a mix of security levels, including minimum, medium, and close, and houses adult male offenders. SFRC first opened in 1985 and has a maximum capacity of 1315 prisoners.
